author: Claudia Camila Vargas
title: Petro faltó a la verdad y revictimizó a familiares de Gloria Lara: Consejo de Estado
text:
JUSTICIA
El Consejo de Estado en una sentencia del 12 de febrero de 2025 ordenó al presidente Petro a retractarse por vulnerar el derecho al buen nombre y honra de los familiares de la señora Gloria Lara de Echeverri quien fue secuestrada y posteriormente asesinada por en 1982.
Inicialmente se culpó a guerrilleros del M-19, no obstante, su crimen quedó en la impunidad pues un Tribunal los absolvió y luego prescribió la acción penal.
Las declaraciones de Petro Este fallo se remonta a unas declaraciones dadas en Estocolmo en 2024 en las que dijo lo siguiente:
"Ellos están exiliados porque los habían acusado falsamente, nunca salieron de su pueblo, de su vereda, los habían acusado falsamente de el (sic) secuestro de una señora llamada Gloria Lara, que al parecer la mató y la secuestró un familiar ”, dijo el presidente.
Sobre estas declaraciones, la familia dijo en el Consejo de Estado que el discurso del presidente de la República revictimiza a la familia Echeverri Lara de manera cruel y degradante, distorsionando la verdad procesal y la memoria de las víctimas.
El fallo del Consejo de Estado La Sala de lo Contencioso Administrativo del Consejo de Estado aseguró que el presidente faltó a la verdad en un nivel más alto debido a su calidad de primer mandatario y figura pública.
“ El incumplimiento a las cargas de veracidad por parte del señor presidente Gustavo Petro Urrego, sí afectó los derechos fundamentales de las accionantes, en tanto se puso en entre dicho su ajenidad a los hechos que precedieron al fallecimiento de la señora Gloria Lara", indicó la Corporación.
La retractación del presidente: mis declaraciones fueron descontextualizadas “Mi intervención no tenía como propósito hacer imputaciones directas o específicas a personas en particular, menos a los familiares de Gloria Lara, quienes también son víctimas", dijo el primer mandatario en cumplimiento de la orden judicial.

author: efe
title: ¿Alto el fuego en Gaza?
text:
Las negociaciones para alcanzar un alto el fuego en la Franja de Gaza avanzan positivamente y se acercan a un principio de acuerdo, si bien las partes todavía no han cerrado ningún pacto definitivo, informaron este sábado fuentes conocedoras de las conversaciones que tienen lugar en El Cairo.
Una fuente palestina dijo a EFE, bajo condición de anonimato, que «hay un gran avance en las negociaciones entre el movimiento palestino Hamás e Israel», y detalló que la delegación egipcia en el proceso negociador «ha alcanzado una formulación acordada en cuanto a los puntos de discrepancia».
Precisó que el último acuerdo sobre el que discuten actualmente incluye una primera fase de 40 días de tregua en la que se liberarán 33 rehenes del total de unos 128 rehenes israelíes retenidos por Hamás, mientras que el Ejército israelí se retirará de las zonas en las que esté presente en la Franja de Gaza.
Según esta misma fuente, la segunda fase continuará por otro periodo de 42 días durante el cual se liberarán todos los rehenes restantes y se extenderá un proceso de «calma permanente en Gaza«, mientras que la tercera y la última fase incluirá intercambiar los cadáveres y durará también 42 días.
También apuntó que «(Sinwar) quiere un compromiso estadounidense por escrito para el fin incondicional de los combates» y solicita también que Israel no impida regresar al territorio ocupado de Cisjordania a los palestinos liberados a cambio de los rehenes.
Según un alto funcionario de Hamás citado por la cadena catarí Al Yazira, el hecho de que Netanyahu insista en que Israel entrará en la ciudad de Rafah con independencia de un posible acuerdo es un «elemento clave» que también se está discutiendo hoy en las conversaciones.
Hasta el momento, en el enclave palestino, al menos 32 personas fallecieron en las últimas 24 horas, lo que elevó a 34.654 el número de víctimas mortales registradas en los hospitales del enclave, además de más de 77.900 heridos, según datos del Ministerio de Sanidad gazatí, dependiente de Hamás.
Comentarios

author: JACKSON WALKER | The National Desk
title: chevron-right
text: {p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs today will hit the mid to upper 50s.{/p}{p}Showers will take over tonight making for a wet start to your Monday morning. Lows should drop to the upper 40s in most spots.{/p}{p}Monday will have frequent showers and the chance of a thundershower or two. The best chance to hear the rumble of thunder will be along the ocean beaches, areas south of Tacoma, and in the Puget Sound Convergence Zone of north King and south Snohomish Counties. Highs on Monday will make it to the mid to upper 50s once again.{/p}{p}Rain will continue on Tuesday under gray skies. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. It will not be all that warm with daytime highs only getting to the low to mid-50s.{/p}{p}Theron Zahn{br}The KOMO 4-Cast Team{br}{/p}{p}{strong}Updated Sunday Morning{/strong}{/p}{p}Mia Schem, a 21-year-old Israeli-French tattoo artist, is likening her time in Hamas captivity to the Holocaust.{br}{/p}{p}In October, Schem was featured in a Hamas video receiving medical attention for a wound on her arm while laying in a bed. She then speaks to the camera as a loud boom is heard in the background.{/p}{p}“They are taking care of me, giving me medicine, everything is fine,” Schem {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/hamas-terrorists-release-video-of-abducted-french-woman-get-us-out-of-here-as-quickly-as-possible-palestine-israel-war-fighting-middle-east-hostage-\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/hamas-terrorists-release-video-of-abducted-french-woman-get-us-out-of-here-as-quickly-as-possible-palestine-israel-war-fighting-middle-east-hostage-\"}said {/a}in Hebrew. “I only ask that they bring me home as soon as possible to my parents, to my siblings. Please get us out of here as quickly as possible.”{/p}{p}Schem was recently released as part of a temporary ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. In a new {a href=\"https://twitter.com/IMTIzionism/status/1740424632606589343\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IMTIzionism/status/1740424632606589343\"}interview{/a}, she speaks candidly about the maltreatment of individuals captured by Hamas.{/p}{p}“It was important to me to reflect the real situation on the people who live in Gaza,” Schem said in a preview clip released by Israel's Channel 12 News Thursday.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/lady-in-red-photographed-fleeing-oct-7-hamas-attacks-feels-guilty-over-survival-report-says-vlada-patapov-israel-nova-music-festival-terrorists-terrorism-gaza-palestine-middle-east-conflict#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/lady-in-red-photographed-fleeing-oct-7-hamas-attacks-feels-guilty-over-survival-report-says-vlada-patapov-israel-nova-music-festival-terrorists-terrorism-gaza-palestine-middle-east-conflict#\"}'Lady in red' photographed fleeing Oct. 7 Hamas attacks feels guilty over survival, report says{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}When asked what the “important thing” she wants people to understand is, Schem said her treatment by Hamas was historically evil.{/p}{blockquote}“I went through the Holocaust,” she said. “Everyone there is a terrorist.\"{/blockquote}{p}She went on to describe the conditions in the Hamas camps as scary and strict.{/p}{p}“I was closed in the room, it's dark. Talking is forbidden. You must not be seen, heard. They are hiding you. There is a terrorist watching you 24/7, looking at you, raping you with his eyes,” she said.{/p}{p}The captivity made Schem fear for her life, she said.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/viral-post-sparks-outrage-for-suggesting-hamas-terrorists-treated-hostage-unexpectedly-well-maree-campbell-the-curated-edit-israel-maya-regev-hostages-palestine-gaza-strip-twitter-x-elon-musk#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/viral-post-sparks-outrage-for-suggesting-hamas-terrorists-treated-hostage-unexpectedly-well-maree-campbell-the-curated-edit-israel-maya-regev-hostages-palestine-gaza-strip-twitter-x-elon-musk#\"}Viral post sparks outrage for suggesting Hamas terrorists treated hostage 'unexpectedly well'{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}“Sure, there’s fear of getting raped. There is fear of dying. There is a fear, you are scared,\" she explained. \"I was at his house of his family. His wife was outside the room with the children. That was the only reason he did not rape me.”{/p}{p}Social media influencer Sulaiman Ahmed incorrectly claimed in October that Schem was a hostage of Israel, not Hamas. The same user wrongly stated Israel had destroyed a Greek Orthodox church in Gaza, despite the church’s own claims to the contrary. He later admitted to his mistake.{/p}{p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. She then speaks to the camera as a loud boom is heard in the background.{/p}{p}“They are taking care of me, giving me medicine, everything is fine,” Schem {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/hamas-terrorists-release-video-of-abducted-french-woman-get-us-out-of-here-as-quickly-as-possible-palestine-israel-war-fighting-middle-east-hostage-\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/hamas-terrorists-release-video-of-abducted-french-woman-get-us-out-of-here-as-quickly-as-possible-palestine-israel-war-fighting-middle-east-hostage-\"}said {/a}in Hebrew. “I only ask that they bring me home as soon as possible to my parents, to my siblings. Please get us out of here as quickly as possible.”{/p}{p}Schem was recently released as part of a temporary ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. In a new {a href=\"https://twitter.com/IMTIzionism/status/1740424632606589343\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IMTIzionism/status/1740424632606589343\"}interview{/a}, she speaks candidly about the maltreatment of individuals captured by Hamas.{/p}{p}“It was important to me to reflect the real situation on the people who live in Gaza,” Schem said in a preview clip released by Israel's Channel 12 News Thursday.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/lady-in-red-photographed-fleeing-oct-7-hamas-attacks-feels-guilty-over-survival-report-says-vlada-patapov-israel-nova-music-festival-terrorists-terrorism-gaza-palestine-middle-east-conflict#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/lady-in-red-photographed-fleeing-oct-7-hamas-attacks-feels-guilty-over-survival-report-says-vlada-patapov-israel-nova-music-festival-terrorists-terrorism-gaza-palestine-middle-east-conflict#\"}'Lady in red' photographed fleeing Oct. 7 Hamas attacks feels guilty over survival, report says{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}When asked what the “important thing” she wants people to understand is, Schem said her treatment by Hamas was historically evil.{/p}{blockquote}“I went through the Holocaust,” she said. “Everyone there is a terrorist.\"{/blockquote}{p}She went on to describe the conditions in the Hamas camps as scary and strict.{/p}{p}“I was closed in the room, it's dark. author: UOL
title: Em casa, Cuiabá perde para Palestino-CHI e é eliminado nos playoffs da Sul-Americana
text:
Esporte Cuiabá cai em casa para o Palestino e está fora da Sul-Americana 25/07/2024 20h58
Junior Marabel, do Palestino, comemora gol contra o Cuiabá, na Copa Sul-Americana Imagem: Reprodução/X/CDPalestinoSADP Nesta quinta-feira (25), pelo jogo de volta dos playoffs da Sul-Americana, o Cuiabá recebeu o Palestino-CHI na Arena Pantanal e perdeu por 2 a 1.
O que aconteceu Junior Marabel e Gonzalo Sosa marcaram para os chilenos, e André Luís descontou para os donos da casa. Os visitantes abriram o placar no primeiro tempo e aumentaram a vantagem no início da segunda etapa, enquanto o Cuiabá só reagiu na reta final do jogo.
Com o resultado negativo, o Dourado, que empatou por 1 a 1 o duelo de ida, deu adeus à competição. A equipe brigava por uma vaga nas oitavas da Sul-Americana por ter ficado em segundo lugar do Grupo G, atrás do Lanús-ARG.
Demétrio Vecchioli
Brasil descobre ter uma das melhores do mundo no gol
Casagrande
Vencer a Nigéria deixa a seleção mais segura
André Santana
A dor das mães negras com filhos mortos pela polícia
Jamil Chade
Guerras barram o sonho de despolitizar Olimpíadas
Do outro lado, o Palestino conquistou a vaga nas eliminatórias. Agora, enfrenta o Independiente Medellín-COL.
Classificação e jogos Copa Sul-Americana O Cuiabá retorna aos gramados neste domingo, contra o Athletico-PR, pela 20ª rodada do Brasileirão. A bola rola às 19h (de Brasília), na Arena Pantanal.
Já o Palestino joga diante do Cobreloa na segunda-feira, pela 17ª rodada do Campeonato Chileno. A partida acontece às 21h (de Brasília), no Estádio Zorros del Desierto. Por outro lado, o jogo de ida, contra o Belgrano, será realizado no dia 14 de agosto, com horário ainda a ser definido.
Como foi o jogo O Cuiabá começou pressionando. Logo no primeiro minuto, Pitta ajeitou para Deyverson, mas o centroavante bateu travado na defesa adversária e a bola se perdeu em escanteio. Na cobrança, a zaga do Palestino afastou bem de cabeça.
No entanto, aos oito minutos, a equipe chilena abriu o placar, com Marabel. O atleta recebeu em velocidade e finalizou de primeira. O gol, apesar de ter sido invalidado pelo assistente de campo, foi confirmado pelo VAR.
Continua após a publicidade Relacionadas De novo: Torcida do Inter invade gramado após queda na Sul-Americana Inter empata com o Central e é eliminado nos playoffs da Sul-Americana Bragantino vira na Sul-Americana, avança e encara Corinthians nas oitavas Aos 16 minutos do segundo tempo, Sosa anotou o segundo do Palestino no jogo. O camisa 9, bem colocado na área, recebeu o cruzamento de Ariel Martínez, antecipou a zaga e cabeceou para o fundo das redes.
Até que aos 32, o atacante, em nova jogada, cortou e finalizou. A bola bateu na marcação, sobrando assim para André Luís, que não perdoou e diminuiu o marcador.
Comunicar erro Veja também Deixe seu comentário Só para assinantes

author: Indiana BHA; September
title: 2024 Indiana BHA Chapter Rendezvous Recap
text:
The
Indiana Chapter of BHA hosted their 4th annual Rendezvous at Rockville Lake Park Campground this last weekend. The event was a massive success and rollicking good time!
Three dozen people descended on the
Rockville Lake Park property Friday afternoon and kicked things off with cold beverages around the campfire, stories of success and near misses on big game public land hunts, and some folks enjoyed late night catfishing.
Saturday began with a stewardship event, including trail work, clearing brush to create better access for shore fishing, and paddling kayaks to pick up trash along the shoreline. After that, the group gathered for a wild game taco bar, provided for free by members of the Indiana Chapter Board of Directors. This included caribou, smoked barbacoa venison, and wild turkey fajitas.
We were joined for lunch by members of the Indiana State Trappers Association, who following the feast gave a shortened version of the Trapper Education Class. Participants learned about the history of trapping, types of traps, where to strategically place them, and a trap setting demonstration.
After this, the group stoked the fire, grabbed cold beverages, and kicked back and prepared for the raffle. This is one of our biggest fundraisers of the year, and in addition to merch sales we were able to raise significant funds that will go directly back into supporting the national BHA and defending Indiana's public lands, waters, and wildlife.
Some great prizes were available this year from our sponsors, including swag bags with items from the Indiana Turn-In-a-Poacher, deer scent from Hoosier Trapping Supply, our state-level sponsor who also donated an awesome coyote trapping kit. We also had a BullDog XP Archery target, ground blinds from FeraDyne Outdoors, binoculars from Vortex, a dozen full body speck decoys donated from our members, and gift cards from Waltons, SportDog, and Work Sharp.
Saturday night we gathered around the campfire and talked about some of the most pressing conservation issues in Indiana. After the fundraising, conversation, and recruitment, we called our Rendezvous a success. Following the event, we had folks who were in attendance sign up for memberships and follow us on our social media. We are looking forward to the next one!

author: lavozdegalicia
title: El Festigal arranca en el Campus con Ulex, Alana o Dakidarría
text:
Continuará el 25 con más música y actividades variadas
24 jul 2025 . Actualizado a las 05:00 h.Festival
Festigal 2025
Hoy • Desde las 21.45 • Campus Vida • Actuaciones de Ulex (21.45); Alana (22.30); Dakidarría (00.00); y Hugo Guezeta (01.35 horas).
Circo
Circanelo
Hoy • 18.30 • Rúa Manuel Vázquez Cacharrón • Teatro gestual, danza y acrobacias. Para niños.
DEGUSTACIÓN
Tarta de Santiago
Hoy • 12 a 14 y 17 a 19 horas • Centro comercial As Cancelas • Para celebrar el Día de Galicia habrá una degustación gratuita de Tarta de Santiago de Hornos Lamastelle y un maridaje de Gotas de Santiago. Los que se llamen Santiago, Jacobo, Thiago, Yago, Diego o Jaime recibirán una tarta por su santo.
EJERCICIO
Método «Te mato»
Hoy • 18 horas • Gimnasio Gym Tonic • Clase de ejercicios con el método «Te mato», para todos los niveles, con límite de plazas.
MAGIA
«Ledicias», del Mago Paco
Hoy • 19.00 horas • Área recreativa del río Furelos, en Melide • Juegos y magia en un mundo fantástico.
